description.displayText: I hired Bruna to help us move out of our office space in NYC. I was not in town so I needed someone who could be trusted to take full control of the move, Bruna was awesome. She was very communicative with her schedule and how long she thought the project would take. She went above and beyond by selling many of the items we needed to find new homes for, and coordinating pickups with the buyers. She is a true self starter and handled the entire project on her own.  I would hire her again and recommend her to anyone who needs a reliable and trust worthy person for their home or business projects.

description.displayText: There aren't enough check boxes here to define how grateful we are of Bruna's service to our son and family.  Bruna hits the ground running and can, with ease and warmth, keep up with the  fast paced lives of working parents and city kids. She is very very intelligent and offers solutions while also proactively taking on tasks via her own instinct. Bruna worked with our son who has ASD and was responsible for managing schedules, school, snacks.. the works. She was so warm with him and communicative with us as parents. She is pragmatic and has an air of calm we all need in our lives. This girl is a unicorn people!
